Posts.Content: Nov 4, 2010 08:54AM hippychickmom wrote: Hi all, Thanks for listening.  As for the results...I live in Northwestern Ontario in a small town, I have travelled 6 hours just to see this doctor...He has told me that the results would take 10 days, the only other way I could get them is for him to do a teleconference in my community at the health centre but his booking lady said that, that service is not available until December 6th (Not an option).  So I have to wait those 2 weeks and then he is away for 1 week... I don't know why this happens to me...both times I delivered my kids, my dr went on vacation when I was due...lol  So I am just going to have to practice something I don't have and that is patience. Thanks again
Posts.Title: Ultrasound guided core biopsy tomorrow!!! hippychickmom D4Hope
